title: Celestial Sparkle: Diamond Kada Bangles - మెరిసే వజ్రాల కడా గాజులు
materials: 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with brilliant-cut Diamonds of VS clarity and G color
totaling 6.88 carats. The gold weight is approximately 40 grams.
features: These exquisite kada bangles showcase a contemporary design with three rows of meticulously prong-set diamonds. The symmetrical arrangement enhances the sparkle and creates a luxurious feel. The inner edges are smoothly finished for comfortable wear. Classic zig-zag row arrangement for maximal light refraction.
colors: Warm yellow gold complements the dazzling white diamonds
creating a timeless and elegant aesthetic.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of glamour. Suitable for both traditional South Indian attire and modern ensembles. Ideal for bridal wear during Muhurtham and other wedding ceremonies.
description: These diamond kada bangles are a timeless investment. The combination of high-quality gold and brilliant-cut diamonds ensures lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, while the intricate diamond setting showcases exceptional craftsmanship. A classic design updated with modern flair. Symbol of prosperity and auspiciousness.
